TopicTitle: DragonLady DRA Space Vehicle [Kerbal Escape Ready]

Articles.Content:
Demo on YouTube

 

 

Hey Guys

Here is my first post for spacecraft. I've designed this craft which I named "DragonLady" for no particular reason. 

This vehicle look and function suspiciously like Soyuz R-7, in fact, I basically use the design of Soyuz and build it with stock parts (V0.9) 

You may download the  DragonLady DRA Spacecraft HERE

There is NO docking ability, however, you may change the payload yourself according to your wish.

This is one of the most reliable and efficient vehicle I've ever built to date. Enjoy and hope you guys like it!

Photos available below, and staging instructions.

A shot during daylight on the launch pad.

At night, on the launch pad

LIFTOFF!!

Staging:

Stage 1 (4) - Main Engine + 4 Boosters 

Stage 2 (3) - Booster Separation

Stage 3 (2) - Escape Tower Separation

Stage 4 (1) - MECO/SEP+SE IGN

Stage 5 (0) - Parachute + SECO/SEP <--- Parachute and SECO/SEP separated into two stage

 

Edited January 23, 2016 by Caleb Kam
Photos / Craft URL fixed, Added Demo Clip

Welcome aboard, Caleb Kam. You'll have to find another host to share things here I'm afraid. See here for why mediafire links are blocked: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/130041-mediafire-links-removed/

Looks nice!  Welcome to the spacecraft exchange!
just a little tip, to save weight cut the amount of fuel in the sepratrons they were burning way longer than they need to.

13 hours ago, Prometius said:

just a little tip, to save weight cut the amount of fuel in the sepratrons they were burning way longer than they need to.

Cut weight for solar escape? lol

I've tried carrying a part of space station (which is quite heavy) and I still have too much spare fuel for first stage..

But yeah, sure I'll make some changes if I'm going to design another vehicle.
I have found that on my builds 1.6 fuel in them is just enough to kick them away from the rocket
